transcript.text: [Music]
[Music]
hi and welcome you're listening to the
x-22 report my name is Dave and this is
episode 1148 a.n today's date is
December 9th 2016 and the title of the
episode is central bankers tested
bailouts baylin's banning cash next gold
confiscation let's get into the economic
collapse financial news now yesterday we
were discussing the market and how it
might go over 20,000 now of course we
understand why this is happening we
realize that the elite the central
bankers well they're pushing this
economy into over drive they want you to
believe they want you to understand that
Obama he created an economy that is
incredible and they want you to
understand this this is why we're seeing
this right now because when Trump and
now we're hearing that maybe he will not
be sworn in maybe something will happen
but we'll have to see and when he gets
into office and let's say he does we'll
go with that they're going to say the
economy was incredible and during
Trump's presidency during his term the
economy fell apart because of what he
has done now they might shift this to
another country another group depending
on how this all plays out but we see
what they're doing right now let's take
for example a consumer confidence doll
over the corporate media that Americans
are very confident in the current
conditions and they haven't been higher
than this since July of 2005 now when we
look back in time and we look at the
image consumer confidence we see that it
reached all-time high
in the middle of 2007 approaching 2008
and you know what happened after that
the entire economy fell apart well we're
at the same level as we were back then
kind of scary because it looks like
we're repeating the same exact pattern
when we look at the stock market we were
at 14,000 and change in the Dow during
the 2008 year the highest ever people
were amazed it's unbelievable well here
we are approaching 20,000 and of course
the corporate earnings the sales
everything doesn't fit we know what's
happening we know the Fed is creating
covertly currency like crazy shoving in
to the stock market they're just
shoveling it in to boost this as high as
it possibly can and what's very
interesting is that the Federal Reserve
they released its latest progress report
and it reported that the net worth of
households and nonprofits they're lumped
together rose in the third quarter by
1.8% or 1.59 trillion to a record 90
trillion dollars that's up 6% or 5.2
trillion from a year ago
now that 12-month increase of five point
two trillion is larger than the GDP of
Japan they're saying the total household
net worth is now nearly 5 times the size
of u.s. GDP in 2007 and that was the top
of the bubble during that period and
household net worth was sixty six point
five trillion or about 4.5 times the
size of GDP before it all blew up
and we're at 90 trillion we're at the
top of the bubble how do you think this
is going to play out it's going to be a
complete disaster but the question is
who has all this wealth because the Fed
had another report where they reported
that 46 percent of adults do not have
enough money to cover a $400 emergency
they'd have to sell some furniture or
charge it on their Mac style cards to
get by
bankrate.com also found that 63% of
Americans don't have enough savings to
pay for a 500 to $1,000 emergency so the
question is who has all this wealth well
we know where it went it went to the
elite the top echelon because in the end
game they're extracting all the wealth
that's what they're doing now when we
look at hotel inventories we see a
familiar pattern and when we look at all
these indicators we see a very very
familiar pattern right now for the third
month in a row wholesale inventories
dropped year-over-year tumbling about
0.4 percent in October and when we look
at this and we go back in time we go
back to the year 2000 well we saw the
same thing happen
fast-forward to 2007 going to 2008 we
saw the same exact thing happen
we're at that point right now once again
which means we're heading into a
depression because at this point we
should already be in a recession and
we've looked at many different
indicators that are flashing red lights
showing us that we are already in that
recession slash depression and it looks
like the central bank's well they're
almost complete with all their testing
what do I mean by that
well if you remember back going back in
time they tested the bailouts how would
that work that was in 2008 how will
people react to this well people did it
they didn't like it the United States
passed the law no bailouts other
governments passed laws no bailouts that
didn't work that well then they went a
step further and I said alright let's
try bailing Cyprus let's help let's see
how people react didn't go over so bad
we're able to lock their accounts
not many people protested rioted we're
able to swap out their currency for
other worthless paper we're able to have
capital controls for over a year that
test went over pretty darn good then we
went to Greece let's see if we can do
the same exact thing there many people
took their cash out of the bank
prior to ballon well this is a problem
so what do they do they started up the
story talking about banning cash Europe
the 500 euro India the 500 rupee the
United States the $100 bill they started
the talks putting it out there and then
in India they tried it well it didn't go
as well as they thought
but people brought in their currency and
exchanged it for smaller bills the
beginning of banning cash and now in
India they're going to the next test
because we know the currency well that
isn't the wealth of the people they want
gold they want assets if you really
think about it this is what the central
bankers do they put a country into debt
they give them worthless paper and then
once the countries so far into debt and
there's nothing else they can do the
creditors the bankers all of them they
swoop in and they purchase
they're assets for pennies on the dollar
and of course what are the view they use
worthless paper to purchase these hard
assets well this is what they're going
to do to the people and in India well
they are beginning to confiscate gold
and what they're doing is the government
is allowing the tax officials to go into
people's homes to go through their
things looking for gold could be gold
jewelry it could be bars it doesn't
really matter and the government
clarified among other things the rules
governing when tax officials could seize
gold so nothing would happen if the
holding is limited to 500 grams per
married women 250 grams per unmarried
woman and 100 grams per male it also
said there would be no limits on jewelry
provided it is acquired from inheritance
also the officer conducting the search
has discretion to not seize even higher
quantity of gold jewelry what this means
unfortunately is that India's income tax
officers they've just won the lottery
during a raid they can on the spot
decide whether or not to confiscate
family's gold holdings and remember the
people of India they hold a lot of gold
approximately about 20,000 metric tons
of inherited gold so they want to see
how the people react they want to see
what the people are going to do this
happened here in the United States where
it happened a little differently where
the United States came in and gave
people worthless paper for their gold I
think it was $20 an ounce and as soon as
they had all the gold they upped it to
35 well this time around the entire
system is plagued with debt they want
your hard assets they want whatever you
have
and they're coming for it and you can
see over time how they are testing this
step by step by step very slowly very
methodically to make sure people don't
realize what's going on but when you
start putting all the pieces together
and you're lining it up and you see
what's going on you see exactly what
they're doing because sooner or later
all of this is going to happen in each
and every one of these countries and
those people who keep their currency
that don't have gold who haven't hidden
their gold well guess what
it's gonna disappear and you need to
protect yourself you need to be prepared
it's gonna happen on day one when
everything collapses no remember just
because the stock market comes down I
don't know ten thousand points let's say
let's say it's cut in half it doesn't
mean that everyone's gonna be running
around on the streets with their hands
up saying oh my god we're collapsing
we're collapsing no people are gonna be
sitting there going okay
it fell it's gonna go back up it always
does because this is what we've been
told right the corporate media the
president the central bank they're all
gonna come out there and tell you it's
fine people are not going to get that
excited people have been brainwashed
into being very calm in these situations
because they think everything will be
fine because the government just told us
that's going to be fine and it's going
to happen very slowly people not going
to realize that as we move along that
things are getting worse and worse and
worse and a couple weeks in that's when
people are going to go crazy that's when
people are going to say mmm something's
wrong here I can't get fuel I can't get
goods from the market something is
happening but of course the corporate
media the president the central bank
they're still gonna tell you everything
is fine this is why you need to be
prepared listen everyone thanks a lot
for listening be well be safe and
especially be prepared
thanks a lot
you
